inputs.remark: 缺少V2 （1 month follow-up），V3 （3 month follow-up）和V4（6 month follow-up）

logic_summary: Added V2 (1 month follow-up) with THI 62, TFI 78 and notes on sound enrichment/TRT initiation.
Added V3 (3 month follow-up) with THI 48, TFI 50 and notes on CBT.
Added V4 (6 month follow-up) with THI 36, TFI 48, Concussion Checklist 33, and notes on medication changes and TRT success.

history.present_illness: 1 month follow-up. Patient began sound enrichment at home using masker-app and classical music at a comfortable volume.
history.prior_management: Started TRT + mild amplification for the left ear. Initiated an app-based masker when driving; acquired filtered earplugs (ETY plugs) for sporting events.

tests.name: Questionnaires
tests.key_findings: THI score was 62 and TFI score 78.

history.present_illness: 3 month follow-up. Attended a first visit with CBT and decided not to pursue it. Reported receiving good strategies for working through anxiety and was able to practice techniques at home.
6 month follow-up. Patient was emotional, expressing gratitude and reporting symptoms had improved dramatically. Taking Melatonin for sleep; no longer Desyrel.
history.prior_management: Managing tinnitus with TRT device/streamed masking sounds during the day with good success.
history.patient_goals: Recommended to continue TRT for at least 18 months before starting sound therapy reduction plan.

tests.name: Questionnaires
tests.key_findings: Concussion symptom checklist score was 33, THI 36, and TFI 48.
